plugins.name: productivity
plugins.description: Manage tasks, plan your day, and build up memory of important context about your work. Syncs with your calendar, email, and chat to keep everything organized and on track.

plugins.name: enterprise-search
plugins.description: Search across all of your company's tools in one place. Find anything across email, chat, documents, and wikis without switching between apps.

plugins.name: cowork-plugin-management
plugins.description: Create, customize, and manage plugins tailored to your organization's tools and workflows. Configure MCP servers, adjust plugin behavior, and adapt templates to match how your team works.

plugins.name: sales
plugins.description: Prospect, craft outreach, and build deal strategy faster. Prep for calls, manage your pipeline, and write personalized messaging that moves deals forward.

plugins.name: finance
plugins.description: Streamline finance and accounting workflows, from journal entries and reconciliation to financial statements and variance analysis. Speed up audit prep, month-end close, and keeping your books clean.

plugins.name: data
plugins.description: Write SQL, explore datasets, and generate insights faster. Build visualizations and dashboards, and turn raw data into clear stories for stakeholders.

plugins.name: legal
plugins.description: Speed up contract review, NDA triage, and compliance workflows for in-house legal teams. Draft legal briefs, organize precedent research, and manage institutional knowledge.

plugins.name: marketing
plugins.description: Create content, plan campaigns, and analyze performance across marketing channels. Maintain brand voice consistency, track competitors, and report on what's working.

plugins.name: customer-support
plugins.description: Triage tickets, draft responses, escalate issues, and build your knowledge base. Research customer context and turn resolved issues into self-service content.

plugins.name: product-management
plugins.description: Write feature specs, plan roadmaps, and synthesize user research faster. Keep stakeholders updated and stay ahead of the competitive landscape.

plugins.name: bio-research
plugins.description: Connect to preclinical research tools and databases (literature search, genomics analysis, target prioritization) to accelerate early-stage life sciences R&D
